import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

def crawl(url):
    response = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')
    return soup

from crawl import crawl

url = 'your_target_url'

soup = crawl(url)

# Handle scraping logic here

print('Crawling Complete!')
